Title: Crystal Nutrition
Description:
Yes, blue dragons eat normal food, but the most important part of their diet is magical in nature. Wherever the blue flight can be found, you can be sure there is a source of nutritious ley crystals nearby.

Of course, the homelands of the blue dragons became home to many others during their absence. The brackenhide gnolls have settled in our lands with the most ley crystals and taken them for themselves. You will need to enter their camps to reclaim the crystals for our whelp.
ObjectivesText: Gather 6 Bite-Sized Ley Crystals from Brackenhide Hollow for the Azure Hatchling.
